sqlQuery.name: CollectionsBySourceID
sqlQuery.sql: select distinct lta.name as source_id, '@PROJECT_ID@' as project_id from apidbtuning.LightTraps lta, ($$collectionsBySourceID$$) ds WHERE lta.name = ds.source_id

sqlQuery.name: LightTrapsByCharacteristics
sqlQuery.sql: select lta.name as source_id, '@PROJECT_ID@' as project_id from apidbtuning.LightTraps lta where lta.pan_id in ($$lighttraps_nf$$)

sqlQuery.name: LightTrapsByHouseholdIds
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT lta.name as source_id , '@PROJECT_ID@' as project_id, da.name as household, wdk_weight FROM ($$household_result$$) source_set, apidbtuning.PANIO io, apidbtuning.Households da, apidbtuning.LightTraps lta WHERE source_set.source_id = da.name AND da.pan_id = io.input_pan_id AND io.output_pan_id = lta.pan_id
